alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 11 at 8:21AM MDT until May 12 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek Near Fountain Creek near Fountain affecting Colorado Springs Vicinity/Southern El Paso County/Rampart Range Below 7400 Feet zone. For the Fountain Creek...including Colorado Springs, Fountain Creek near Fountain, Pinon, Pueblo...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Fountain Creek Near Fountain Creek near Fountain. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 430 PM MDT.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft
